languages.text: Голос Мастера вокса Вигдис Сурри Отта из рода Толиман долго звучал в Просторе Коронус, возвещая о прибытии Вольного Торговца. Для верующих он нес благую весть, а еретиков ввергла в ужас, знаменуя близостью праведного воздаяния. После смерти Вигдис была удостоена чести увековечивания в виде сервочерепа-глашатая. Еще много веков ее голос возносил хвалу роду фон Валанциус, разнося приказы по палубам.

The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse, trumpeting the arrival of the Rogue Trader. It brought glad tidings to the faithful and instilled horror in heretics awaiting righteous retribution. After her death, Vigdis was granted the honour of being immortalised in a herald servo-skull. For many centuries to come, her voice praised the von Valancius dynasty, transmitting orders across decks.
languages.original_text: Голос Мастера вокса Вигдис Сурри Отта из рода Толиман долго звучал в Просторе Коронус, возвещая о прибытии Вольного Торговца. Для верующих он нес благую весть, а еретиков ввергла в ужас, знаменуя близостью праведного воздаяния. После смерти Вигдис была удостоена чести увековечивания в виде сервочерепа-глашатая. Еще много веков ее голос возносил хвалу роду фон Валанциус, разнося приказы по палубам.

traits.locale_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty has long resounded in the Koronus Expanse, trumpeting the arrival of the Rogue Trader. It brought glad tidings for the faithful, and complete horror for the heretics, for whom it meant an approach of righteous punishment. After her death, Vigdis was graced with the honour of being immortalised in a herald servo-skull. For many centuries to come, her voice praised the von Valancius dynasty, transmitting orders around the decks.

languages.text: 长久以来，托里曼王朝的音阵大师维格迪斯·苏里·欧塔的声音回荡在科罗努斯扩区，宣告着行商浪人的到来。它给信徒带来喜讯，也将恐惧灌输至等待正义清算的异端分子心中。在她死后，她被授予在伺服头骨中获得永生的荣誉。在未来的数个世纪里，她的声音仍会赞美冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，继续在甲板上传递命令。
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse, trumpeting the arrival of the Rogue Trader. It brought glad tidings to the faithful and instilled horror in heretics awaiting righteous retribution. After her death, Vigdis was granted the honour of being immortalised in a herald servo-skull. For many centuries to come, her voice praised the von Valancius dynasty, transmitting orders across decks.

traits.locale_text: 长久以来，托里曼王朝的音阵大师维格迪斯·苏里·欧塔的声音回荡在科罗努斯扩区，宣告着行商浪人的到来。它给信徒带来喜讯，也将恐惧灌输至等待正义清算的异端分子心中。在她死后，她被授予在伺服头骨中获得永生的荣誉。在未来的数个世纪里，她的声音仍会赞美冯·瓦兰修斯王朝，继续在甲板上传递命令。

languages.text: Die Stimme von Voxmeisterin Vigdis Surri Otta von der Toliman-Dynastie war in der Koronus-Ausdehnung lange zu hören, wo sie die Ankunft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} verkündete. Sie brachte den Gläubigen frohe Kunde und erfüllte die Herzen der Ketzer, die auf rechtschaffene Vergeltung warteten, mit Furcht. Nach ihrem Tod wurde Vigdis die Ehre gewährt, als Boten-Servoschädel unsterblich gemacht zu werden. Noch viele Jahrhunderte lang pries ihre Stimme die Dynastie von Valancius und übermittelte Befehle von Deck zu Deck.
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse, trumpeting the arrival of the Rogue Trader. It brought glad tidings to the faithful and instilled horror in heretics awaiting righteous retribution. After her death, Vigdis was granted the honour of being immortalised in a herald servo-skull. For many centuries to come, her voice praised the von Valancius dynasty, transmitting orders across decks.

traits.locale_text: Die Stimme von Voxmeisterin Vigdis Surri Otta von der Toliman-Dynastie war lange in der Ausdehnung zu hören, wo sie die Ankunft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} verkündete. Sie brachte den Gläubigen frohe Kunde und erfüllte die Herzen der Ketzer, die auf rechtschaffene Vergeltung warteten, mit Furcht. Nach ihrem Tod wurde Vigdis die Ehre gewährt, als Boten-Servoschädel unsterblich gemacht zu werden. Noch viele Jahrhunderte lang pries ihre Stimme die Dynastie von Valancius und übermittelte Befehle von Deck zu Deck.

languages.text: La voix de la maîtresse-vox Vigdis Surri Otta de la dynastie Toliman résonna pendant bien longtemps à travers les Étendues de Koronus, annonçant l'arrivée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Elle apportait l'espoir aux fidèles et semait la terreur chez les hérétiques, qui savaient alors que leur châtiment était imminent. Après sa mort, Vigdis eut l'honneur d'être immortalisée dans un servocrâne annonciateur. Des siècles durant, sa voix loua la dynastie von Valancius et transmit des ordres d'un pont à l'autre.
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse, trumpeting the arrival of the Rogue Trader. It brought glad tidings to the faithful and instilled horror in heretics awaiting righteous retribution. After her death, Vigdis was granted the honour of being immortalised in a herald servo-skull. For many centuries to come, her voice praised the von Valancius dynasty, transmitting orders across decks.

traits.locale_text: La voix de la maîtresse-vox Vigdis Surri Otta de la dynastie Toliman résonna pendant bien longtemps à travers les Étendues, annonçant l'arrivée {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Elle apportait l’espoir aux fidèles et semait la terreur chez les hérétiques, qui savaient alors que leur châtiment était imminent. Après sa mort, Vigdis eut l’honneur d’être immortalisée dans un servocrâne annonciateur. Pendant de nombreux siècles, sa voix loua la dynastie von Valancius et transmit des ordres d'un pont à l'autre.

languages.text: La voz de la maestra de vocos Vigdis Surri Otta de la dinastía Toliman resonó durante mucho tiempo en la Extensión de Koronus, anunciando la llegada de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Traía consigo alivio para los fieles y terror para los herejes, a los que les esperaba la justicia. Tras su muerte, Vigdis recibió el honor de quedar inmortalizada como servocráneo heraldo. Durante muchos siglos, su voz alabaría a la dinastía von Valancius y transmitiría órdenes por las cubiertas.
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse, trumpeting the arrival of the Rogue Trader. It brought glad tidings to the faithful and instilled horror in heretics awaiting righteous retribution. After her death, Vigdis was granted the honour of being immortalised in a herald servo-skull. For many centuries to come, her voice praised the von Valancius dynasty, transmitting orders across decks.

languages.text: トリマン王朝のヴォクス・マスター、ヴィグディス・スール・アウタの声は、自由開拓者の到来を告げる福音として、コロヌス・エクスパンスに長く鳴り響いていた。ヴィグディスの声は忠実な人々に吉報をもたらし、正義の報復を待つ異端者たちに恐怖を植え付けた。彼女の死後、ヴィグディスはサーヴォスカルとして不滅の名誉を与えられた。それから何世紀にもわたり、彼女の声はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝を賛美し、ブリッジ全体に命令を伝えつづけた。
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse, trumpeting the arrival of the Rogue Trader. It brought glad tidings to the faithful and instilled horror in heretics awaiting righteous retribution. After her death, Vigdis was granted the honour of being immortalised in a herald servo-skull. For many centuries to come, her voice praised the von Valancius dynasty, transmitting orders across decks.

traits.locale_text: トリマン王朝のヴォクス・マスター、ヴィグディス・スール・アウタの声は、自由開拓者の到来を告げる福音として、コロヌス・エクスパンスに長く鳴り響いていた。ヴィグディスの声は忠実な人々に吉報をもたらし、正義の報復を待つ異端者たちに恐怖を植え付けた。彼女の死後、ヴィグディスはサーヴォスカルとして不滅の名誉を与えられた。それから何世紀にもわたり、彼女の声はフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝を賛美し、ブリッジ全体に命令を伝えつづけた。

languages.text: Toliman hanedanlığından Voks Üstadı Vigdis Surri Otta'nın sesi; Koronus Enginliği'nde uzunca bir süre duyuldu, Hür Tacir'in gelişini duyurdu. İnananlar için bir müjdeci, hak ettikleri cezayı almayı bekleyen kâfirler için ise bir dehşet kaynağıydı. Ölümünün ardından Vigdis, bir haberci hizmelette ölümsüzleştirilme şerefine nail oldu. Sesi yüzyıllar boyunca von Valancius hanedanlığına övgüler yağdırdı, güvertelerde emirleri iletti.
languages.original_text: The voice of Vox Master Vigdis Surri Otta of the Toliman dynasty was long heard in the Koronus Expanse, trumpeting the arrival of the Rogue Trader. It brought glad tidings to the faithful and instilled horror in heretics awaiting righteous retribution. After her death, Vigdis was granted the honour of being immortalised in a herald servo-skull. For many centuries to come, her voice praised the von Valancius dynasty, transmitting orders across decks.

traits.locale_text: Toliman hanedanlığından Voks Üstadı Vigdis Surri Otta'nın sesi Koronus Enginliği'nde uzunca bir süre duyuldu, Hür Tacir'in gelişini duyurdu. İnananlar için bir müjdeci, hak ettikleri cezayı almayı bekleyen kâfirler için ise bir dehşet kaynağı oldu. Ölümünün ardından Vigdis, bir haberci hizmelette ölümsüzleştirilme onuruna nail oldu. Sesi yüzyıllar boyunca von Valancius hanedanlığına övgüler yağdırdı, güverteler boyunca emirler iletti.
